title: What Does the Face In Clouds Emoji 😶‍🌫️ Mean?

steps.title: The 😶‍🌫️ emoji can mean you’re feeling confused or forgetful.
steps.content: The 😶‍🌫️ emoji can mean you’re feeling confused or forgetful. The face in clouds emoji looks like someone is lost in a haze, so it often means that you feel foggy, or have brain fog. You might use it to say that you’re tired, having trouble concentrating, disoriented, or overwhelmed. [1] X Research source “I pulled an all-nighter last night so I’m barely functioning rn. 😶‍🌫️😶‍🌫️😶‍🌫️” “Today’s been so chaotic. I can’t even remember what I had for breakfast. 😶‍🌫️”

steps.title: 😶‍🌫️ can indicate you’re daydreaming or lost in thought.
steps.content: 😶‍🌫️ can indicate you’re daydreaming or lost in thought. Got your head in the clouds? Use the 😶‍🌫️ to let your friends know you’re busy daydreaming—whether you’re fantasizing about your crush or off in your own magical world. Or, send the face in clouds emoji when you’re thinking deeply about something, like making a decision or solving a problem. “What am I doing? Oh, just planning my future wedding to Myles 😶‍🌫️💭😍” “Hmm, I’m not sure if I want pizza or burgers for dinner tn…😶‍🌫️”

steps.title: The 😶‍🌫️ emoji might represent embarrassment or shyness.
steps.content: The 😶‍🌫️ emoji might represent embarrassment or shyness. Because the face in clouds emoji looks like someone’s hiding in the mist, you can send it to your pals when you want to disappear into the fog, too. You might use it to talk about something embarrassing that happened, or to convey your nervousness about a situation. [2] X Research source “Guess who accidentally called his teacher mom today 😶‍🌫️🫠” “Idk if I want to go to the party anymore…I’ll only know like 2 people 😶‍🌫️”

steps.title: 😶‍🌫️ can refer to smoking or smoke.
steps.content: 😶‍🌫️ can refer to smoking or smoke. The face in clouds emoji can stand in for all kinds of smoking, from cigarettes to cannabis. You might also use it to talk about an activity or situation that involves smoke, like if you’re sitting by a campfire or smoking some brisket for dinner. “Today was super stressful, so I’m about to 😶‍🌫️💨” “The bonfire was so fun, but my hair totally still smells like smoke 😶‍🌫️😶‍🌫️”

steps.title: 😶‍🌫️ might refer to showering or bathing.
steps.content: 😶‍🌫️ might refer to showering or bathing. The clouds around this emoji look a lot like steam or soap bubbles, so you can also use it to say you’re getting ready to take a hot, sudsy shower or bath. This is the perfect way to let someone know you just want to chill out and relax. “I can’t wait to go home, run the bath, and get comfy 😶‍🌫️😴” “I just gotta hop in the shower and then I’ll come pick you up! 😶‍🌫️”

steps.title: The 😶‍🌫️ might indicate foggy or cloudy weather.
steps.content: The 😶‍🌫️ might indicate foggy or cloudy weather. If it’s super foggy or misty outside, send the 😶‍🌫️ emoji to let your pals know the clouds are as thick as pea soup outside. This is a silly way to keep them updated about the weather where you are. “Did you see the fog this morning? I could barely see my own hands! 😶‍🌫️” “It’s so spooky outside! All this mist makes me think a werewolf is nearby 😶‍🌫️🐺”

steps.title: The 😶‍🌫️ simply refers to fogginess, daydreaming, and embarrassment.
steps.content: The 😶‍🌫️ simply refers to fogginess, daydreaming, and embarrassment. Receiving the face in clouds emoji from a girl or guy can mean all of the same things that the emoji usually represents. They might send you 😶‍🌫️ to let you know that they’re feeling tired, confused, embarrassed, or caught in their daydreams. They can also use it to talk about smoking, bathing, or foggy weather. If you’re not sure what 😶‍🌫️ means from someone, consider the context of your conversation. Or, simply text them and ask! Some people might use the 😶‍🌫️ emoji to flirt with you . Dating coach John Keegan agrees that using lots of emojis, teasing you playfully, and being silly are common signs someone is into you .

steps.title: Check in on your friend if they’re feeling foggy or overwhelmed.
steps.content: Check in on your friend if they’re feeling foggy or overwhelmed. If your pal is feeling tired, unmotivated, or disoriented, share some advice or an encouraging message to help them shake off their fogginess . This shows them that you care and want them to feel better, which they’re sure to appreciate. Them : “I can barely think straight, I'm so tired. Idk how I’m gonna make it through the workday. 😶‍🌫️” You : “I’m so sorry. You’ve only got a few hours left to go! If you can, step outside for a bit to help wake yourself up. ❤️”

steps.title: Reassure your pal if they’re embarrassed or uncomfortable.
steps.content: Reassure your pal if they’re embarrassed or uncomfortable. Give your friend your support and sympathy if they just experienced something embarrassing or if they’re feeling shy about trying something new. For instance, offer some encouraging words or empathize with your own embarrassing story. Them : “Soooo I accidentally spilled my drink on Lola at the party. I don’t think she’s interested in me anymore. 😶‍🌫️😩” You : “Oh no! She knows it wasn’t your fault, though. I’m sure she’ll be laughing about it in a day or 2!”

steps.title: Entertain their dreams if their head is in the clouds.
steps.content: Entertain their dreams if their head is in the clouds. If your friend is daydreaming about their love life, goals, or plans for the future, validate their ideas and share in their excitement. You can even help them make their dreams a reality by bringing them down to earth and making a plan to achieve their goals ! Them : “Just thinking about how I’m going to be rich one day and buy a house on the beach 😶‍🌫️🏝️” You : “Yes, I love this for you! And you’re totally going to let me stay over in the summer, right? 😙”

steps.title: The 😶‍🌫️ emoji was created in 2020.
steps.content: The 😶‍🌫️ emoji was created in 2020. The face in clouds emoji was recommended for release by Unicode in September 2020. It is a combination of 2 previously released emojis: the 😶 (face without mouth) emoji and 🌫️ (fog) emoji. [3] X Research source The 😶‍🌫️ emoji was added to Android devices in December 2020 (11.0 update), Apple devices in April 2021 (14.5 update), and Samsung devices in November 2021 (4.0 update).

steps.title: Pair 😶‍🌫️ with other emojis to create different messages and meanings.
steps.content: Pair 😶‍🌫️ with other emojis to create different messages and meanings. Because the face in clouds emoji can refer to a lot of different things, it’s easy to combine it with other emojis to emphasize what you mean: 😶‍🌫️🥱😴: Tired 😶‍🌫️😵😵‍💫🥴: Foggy or disoriented 😶‍🌫️😣🤔🫤: Confused 😶‍🌫️✨💭🌙: Daydreaming 😶‍🌫️🧐🤨: Thinking 😶‍🌫️🫣😳😬😫: Embarrassed 😶‍🌫️🛁🧼🫧: Bathing 😶‍🌫️😮‍💨🚬🍃: Smoking

steps.title: The 😶‍🌫️ emoji is related to lots of other smiley emojis.
steps.content: The 😶‍🌫️ emoji is related to lots of other smiley emojis. Check out these other emojis and what they mean to add more emotion and feeling to your texts: The 😳 (face with wide open eyes) emoji represents embarrassment, shyness, and disbelief. The 🫠 (melting face) emoji symbolizes embarrassment, anxiety, and feeling overwhelmed. The 😵‍💫 (face with spiral eyes) emoji represents dizziness and disorientation. The 😫 (distraught face) emoji represents exhaustion, frustration, and feeling overwhelmed. The 🫣 (face with peeking eyes) emoji symbolizes embarrassment, discomfort, and curiosity.
